code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import reducers from"../reducer";import sagas from"../sagas";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[sagaMiddleware];var store=createStore(reducers,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));window['store']=store;sagaMiddleware.run(sagas);export default store;
